title: Ticket #4798: Add conditional get and expire info to built-in gSOAP web server
description: Enhancing built-in gSOAP web server. Adding "Last-Modified" and "Expires" headers to responses, with new CACHE_FILE_EXPIRE_TIME knob that specifies how long (in seconds) a cache entry is valid before it needs to be checked by the caching proxy for validity (default is 20 minutes). Also, adding ability of web server to respond to "If-Modified-Since" get requests to return a file only if it has been modified.
check_ins: 2014-Dec-30 16:15   Check-in [42061]: For ticket #4798: Added response to If-Modified-Since header and added Last-Modified and Expires headers to HTTP GET responses. (By Carl Vuosalo )
creator: cvuosalo
